MATCH p=(Dhoni)-[r:FOLLOWS]->(Dhoni) DELETE r
MATCH p=(Sudhir)-[r:UMPIRE_OF]->(Ind) Delete r
MATCH (n:umpire) Delete n
MATCH p=(Jadeja)-[r:HIGHEST_WICKET_TAKER_OF]->(Ind) Delete r
MATCH p=(Dhawan)-[r:TOP_SCORER_OF]->(Ind) Delete r
MATCH p=(Dhoni)-[r:CAPTAIN_OF]->(Ind) Delete r
MATCH p=(Ind)-[r:RUNNERS_OF]->(CT2017) Delete r
MATCH p=(Ind)-[r:WINNERS_OF]->(CT2013) Delete r
MATCH (n:Tournament) Delete n
MATCH (n:Country) Delete n
MATCH (n:player) Delete n
MATCH (n:Album) Delete n
